hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransproductStorageMain main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT sec FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransproductStorageSec sec where sec.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT sec FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransproductStorageSec sec where sec.synchroFlag = '0' and sec.inbillPid = ?
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT sec.F_CODE_TYPE FROM U_BAT_TRANSPRODUCTSTORAGESEC sec where sec.F_INBILL_PID = ?
hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransProductMoveMain main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select * from( select s.*,d.f_batch_no f_batch_no1 from U_BAT_TRANSPRODUCTMOVESEC s left join T_BAT_PRODUCTUPDOWN_DETAIL d on s.f_batch_no = substr(d.f_batch_no,-32) and d.f_sys_flag='1' where s.f_synchro_flag='0' and s.f_inbill_pid= ? ) where f_batch_no1 is null
hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransMaterialWithMain main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT sec FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransMaterialWithSec sec where sec.synchroFlag = '0' and sec.inbillPid = ?
SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransFinalProductMain main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT sec FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransFinalProductSec sec where sec.synchroFlag = '0' and sec.inbillPid = ?
SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransPermixTankOrder main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransLeafStorageCabinet main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransLeafSpiceFeeding main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransLeafFeedingOrder main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransBladeFeedingOrder main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransStemSpiceFeeding main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransPeduncleCabinet main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransBlendingOrder main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransLeafessenceFeeding main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransToBaccoInCabinet main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransToBaccoOutCabinet main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
SELECT main FROM sail.beans.entity.UBatTransYesiIntoCabinet main where main.synchroFlag = '0'
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select w.f_pid,w.f_workorder_code from t_bat_workorder w where w.f_process in(select F_GROUP_ESBCODE from v_bat_equ v where v.f_pid in ( select distinct t.f_next_device from T_BAT_EQU_LINK t where t.f_link_type='2' and t.f_pre_device= (SELECT d.f_pid FROM t_pub_dic d where d.f_obj_pid = '82dfffdd-7bcd-4d90-938e-eed60a444d2a' and d.f_sys_flag = '1' and d.f_other_pid2='ae3af42f-95a1-4e40-9a2d-3ca6ed92dbb2' and d.f_value10 = ? ) and t.f_sys_flag='1' )) and to_date(w.f_actual_starttime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(w.f_actual_endtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select t.f_pid,t.f_batch,t.f_batch || g.f_workorder_type as F_WORKORDERCODE,g.f_gd_esb_code,g.f_gd_name,g.f_gx_esb_code, g.f_gx_name,t.f_brand_id,t.f_param_id,t.F_WORKSECTION_ID,p.f_esb_code,p.f_name,p.f_unit,t.f_start_time,t.f_end_time, t.f_upline,t.f_lowline,t.f_target,t.f_cpk,t.f_sigma,t.f_average,t.f_maxvalue,t.f_minvalue,t.f_overnum,t.f_qrate from SPC.QMS_TB_BATCHSTAT t,SPC.QMS_TB_PARAMETER p,SPC.T_BAT_GX_DIC g where t.f_param_id = p.f_pid and g.f_gx_code = p.f_section_id and t.f_batch = ?
hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT s FROM sail.beans.entity.BatZsQaSample s where s.surveyBill = ? and s.sectionCode = ? and s.processCode = ? and s.sysFlag='1'
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select t.f_batch,t.f_batch || g.f_workorder_type as F_WORKORDERCODE,g.f_gd_esb_code,g.f_gd_name,g.f_gx_esb_code, g.f_gx_name, count(1) as F_ROWCOUNT from SPC.QMS_TB_BATCHSTAT t,SPC.QMS_TB_PARAMETER p,SPC.T_BAT_GX_DIC g where t.f_param_id = p.f_pid and g.f_gx_code = p.f_section_id and t.f_batch = ? group by t.f_batch,t.f_batch || g.f_workorder_type ,g.f_gd_esb_code,g.f_gd_name,g.f_gx_esb_code,g.f_gx_name

select t.f_batch,t.f_batch || g.f_workorder_type as F_WORKORDERCODE,g.f_gd_esb_code,g.f_gd_name,g.f_gx_esb_code, g.f_gx_name,p.f_esb_code,p.f_name,p.f_unit,t.f_start_time,t.f_end_time, t.f_upline,t.f_lowline,t.f_target,t.f_cpk,t.f_sigma,t.f_average,t.f_maxvalue,t.f_minvalue,t.f_overnum,t.f_qrate from SPC.QMS_TB_BATCHSTAT t,SPC.QMS_TB_PARAMETER p,SPC.T_BAT_GX_DIC g where t.f_param_id = p.f_pid and g.f_gx_code = p.f_section_id and t.f_batch || g.f_workorder_type = ? and g.f_gx_esb_code = ?
